electricProducts.name: Premium Electric Copper Wires
electricProducts.description: High-quality insulated copper wires for residential and commercial applications. Features fire-resistant coating and excellent conductivity.

electricProducts.name: Industrial Cooler Pump
electricProducts.description: Heavy-duty water cooling pump designed for industrial coolers and HVAC systems. Energy efficient with silent operation.

electricProducts.name: PVC Electrical Conduit Pipes
electricProducts.description: Durable PVC conduit pipes for protecting and routing electrical wiring in walls and ceilings. UV resistant and flame retardant.

electricProducts.name: Smart LED Panel Lights
electricProducts.description: Energy-efficient LED panel lights with adjustable color temperature. Compatible with smart home systems for remote control.

electricProducts.name: Outdoor Flood Lights
electricProducts.description: Weatherproof LED flood lights for exterior illumination. Features motion sensors and dusk-to-dawn automation.

electricProducts.name: MCB Distribution Box
electricProducts.description: Complete distribution box with miniature circuit breakers for residential and commercial electrical installations. Includes surge protection.

electricProducts.name: Ceiling Fan with LED Light
electricProducts.description: Modern ceiling fan with integrated LED lighting and remote control. Features multiple speed settings and reversible motor.

electricProducts.name: Smart Wi-Fi Socket
electricProducts.description: IoT-enabled power socket with energy monitoring and remote control capabilities. Compatible with voice assistants.

electricProducts.name: Industrial Cable Tray System
electricProducts.description: Heavy-duty cable tray system for organizing and protecting electrical cables in industrial settings. Galvanized finish for corrosion resistance.

electricProducts.name: Decorative LED String Lights
electricProducts.description: Waterproof LED string lights for indoor and outdoor decoration. Features multiple lighting modes and timer function.

electricProducts.name: Electrical Switchboard
electricProducts.description: Comprehensive electrical switchboard for residential installations. Includes main switch, RCD protection, and circuit breakers.

electricProducts.name: Solar Panel Inverter
electricProducts.description: Grid-tied solar inverter for converting DC power from solar panels to AC electricity. Features MPPT technology for maximum efficiency.
